trans-unit.source: Connecting a client to the Network Server with the SimpleNetworkClientSample program

seg-source.mrk: Connecting a client to the Network Server with the SimpleNetworkClientSample program

target.mrk: Connecting a client to the Network Server with the SimpleNetworkClientSample program

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkClientSample</codeph> program is a client program that interacts with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server from another JVM.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkClientSample</codeph> program is a client program that interacts with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server from another JVM.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkClientSample</codeph> program is a client program that interacts with the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server from another JVM.

trans-unit.source: The program performs the following tasks:

seg-source.mrk: The program performs the following tasks:

target.mrk: The program performs the following tasks:

trans-unit.source: Loads the network client driver. (Note that this step is not necessary if you are running the client on JDK 1.6 or higher. In that environment, the network client driver loads automatically.)

seg-source.mrk: (Note that this step is not necessary if you are running the client on JDK 1.6 or higher.
In that environment, the network client driver loads automatically.)

target.mrk: (Note that this step is not necessary if you are running the client on JDK 1.6 or higher.
In that environment, the network client driver loads automatically.)

trans-unit.source: Obtains a client connection by using the <codeph>DriverManager</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: Obtains a client connection by using the <codeph>DriverManager</codeph>.

target.mrk: Obtains a client connection by using the <codeph>DriverManager</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Obtains a client connection by using a DataSource.

seg-source.mrk: Obtains a client connection by using a DataSource.

target.mrk: Obtains a client connection by using a DataSource.

trans-unit.source: Tests the database connections by running a sample query.

seg-source.mrk: Tests the database connections by running a sample query.

target.mrk: Tests the database connections by running a sample query.

trans-unit.source: Closes the connections and then exits the program.

seg-source.mrk: Closes the connections and then exits the program.

target.mrk: Closes the connections and then exits the program.

trans-unit.source: You must install the following files in the <codeph>%<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>%\demo\nserverdemo\</codeph> directory before you can run the sample program:

seg-source.mrk: You must install the following files in the <codeph>%<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>%\demo\nserverdemo\</codeph> directory before you can run the sample program:

target.mrk: You must install the following files in the <codeph>%<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>%\demo\nserverdemo\</codeph> directory before you can run the sample program:
